MemberBenefit.name: MemberBenefit
MemberBenefit.description: Represents details about a benefit that’s assigned to a loyalty program member and has a benefit action that’s triggered.

AccountId.description: The ID of the account associated with the member benefit.

BenefitId.description: Required. The ID of the benefit associated with the member benefit.

ContactId.description: The ID of the contact associated with the member benefit.

Description.description: The description of the member benefit.

EndDate.description: The end date of the member benefit.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

MemberId.description: The ID of the member associated with the member benefit.

Name.description: The name of the member benefit.

PrimaryRefObjectRecord.description: The ID of a record created by the member benefit.

PrimaryRefObjectRecordTitle.description: The title of a record created by the member benefit.

SourceType.description: Required. The source of the benefit.

StartDate.description: The start date of the member benefit.

Status.description: Required. The status of the member benefit.
